website_summaries.verdict: Great pair of budget motocross and dirt bike gloves that comes with more protection than other value options.
pros: Heavy duty protection runs almost the entire length of the fingers along the top
Sections of the fabric are ventilated to keep air flowing while riding
cons: Gloves tend to be on the larger size

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, not safe for the road.
customer_reviews.text: They look cool, but offer zero protection on pavement. I fell going just under 10mph in a parking lot and the palm tore right open (see picture). These may work well for motocross, but do not expect any protection on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: They Look Good
customer_reviews.text: I gorgeous these in my search for good wheelchair gloves... they didn't work for that. With a few pushes on the handrims I could see the thumb and palm start to wear. The material was decent quality for BMX gloves though and I gave them to my younger brother, who loves them. He says they fit him perfectly and are very comfortable, and they hold up well if used for biking (their intended purpose). If you need BMX gloves, get these, the quality is good and we'll worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves it. it matches her helmet. it has some light protection but if ur looking for hard plastic or carbon fiber knuckle protection this does not have. it is a nice product. it does offer some light protection.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Tight but right!
customer_reviews.text: Quite a tight fit but as any real man would say; we like it & yes the ladies agree ;) Stretches out overtime & feels just right but only use'm for light-duty activities; simply knowing the soft-hearted materials they're made've.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are super cute but run huge, my husband put these on with no problems we ordered a medium for out seven year old but going to have to order a small and I think they will still be too big.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves, but I ordered a child's size and I received an adult large. I'll use them but I still have to order another pair now for my son. Good quality, not so good on receiving the right product.
customer_reviews.author: LovelyLocks

customer_reviews.title: Sizes fit bigger than normal
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a "medium" for my wife due to ALL other companies fitting correctly. HOWEVER the MEDIUM size of this pair of gloves fits like a LARGE
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Motocross Motorcycle BMX MX ATV Dirt Bike Skeleton Racing Cycling Gloves
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair that I have purchased. Very comfortable, durable, and overall great product. I use these when riding my dirt bike except during cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Pauldeb

customer_reviews.title: Great for intended purpose of causal dirt bike riding
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 14 year old son. Sz large fit him perfectly. Great for intended purpose of causal dirt bike riding.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves.  Honest seller.  Order a size up.
customer_reviews.text: Good gloves and honest seller. Need to order one size up.. I'm normally a large for gloves and had to get XL for these.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Light wait
customer_reviews.text: Material is a bit soft, I got these to protect my 8 year old when he's riding. Not sure they will provide much protection. He likes them though
customer_reviews.author: Camomoma

customer_reviews.title: Not sized like other gloves, order bigger!
customer_reviews.text: Better order at least one size larger! I have 5 pair of gloves marked Large by different manufacturers, all fit. I can barely get these one and they'd rip if I made a fist. Get what you pay for. I'd lose money in gas alone tryin to return them. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Dolle

customer_reviews.title: Great for casual riders
customer_reviews.text: Kids love the looks, they really do not use for comfort or warmth while riding.
customer_reviews.author: st louis reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: For the money, these are great! Fit true to size and good color options.
customer_reviews.author: scootertribe

customer_reviews.title: great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gloves for my 9 year old who races BMX.
customer_reviews.author: Amy G

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly for the price these are decent quality. My kids go through lots of gloves on their dirtbike so it can get costly with name brand. I'd buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kellz

customer_reviews.title: I love these. Great deal and really cool looking
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Great deal and really cool looking. Comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: superman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, great quality!!! They were actually bigger than I thought so my 5 year old will grow into them
customer_reviews.author: Dena C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for the grandson to go along with his new quad
customer_reviews.author: Dave P.

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: I got a large and they fit my 9 year old! these are tiny and do not look like the picture at all
customer_reviews.author: Hank H. Illiard

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fit and work great. Warm enough for fall. Maybe not winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fits my daughter perfect and she loves them
customer_reviews.text: Fits my daughter perfect and she loves them. No more blisters on her hands from riding. Plus they match her quad.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: These run small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the XXL thinking I should get a size larger than normal but these are like a Large.
customer_reviews.author: RL Mize

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my almost 11 year old daughter! Not very thick, or a lot of padding, but they will be perfect for her for when she gets her dirtbike and learning.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Hang on to you grips
customer_reviews.text: I use these for mountain biking and they do the job well price was wright good value
customer_reviews.author: Richard Applebee

customer_reviews.title: Second time buyer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and perfect value for the money you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Tona E

customer_reviews.title: He loved the green design
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 4 year nephew. Ordered the smallest size they had and were a little big but he can grow into them. He loved the green design!
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Feel sturdy (only used 10 times so far) ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Feel sturdy (only used 10 times so far) affordable, id say you get more than you pay for. Strap might break if not careful.

customer_reviews.title: Well made for a inexpensive glove
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 6 months of dirt bike riding pretty good for 10 dollar gloves
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: XXL fits perfect (you would be surprised how many dont fit at ...
customer_reviews.text: XXL fits perfect (you would be surprised how many dont fit at all). Will order rest of families here soon.
customer_reviews.author: Naomii

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off a little
customer_reviews.text: I repeatedly measured my hand and went with what the sizing chart said. Still a little big but so cool Looking and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Akins

customer_reviews.title: Great price for item
customer_reviews.text: Great price for item! Fits perfect. Very comfortable to wear. Would buy again and would recommend to anyone needing a pair of ATV gloves. Fast shipping! Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Bjp

customer_reviews.title: REALLY TIGHT!!
customer_reviews.text: Glove sizing is off. I would order the next size up unless you like them REALLY tight!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bitsi1dog

customer_reviews.title: Speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them and wont ride with out them...
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Got it from my nephew for Christmas? He was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Could have been good.
customer_reviews.text: Way to big. Even measured my sons hands and picked the appropriate measurement and when arrived they were huge.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Adult gloves. Not for kids.
customer_reviews.text: These are not for kids. I wish I had known that when I bought them because they came up when I searched for youth gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Since they were a gift, I was terrified of getting the wrong size since I couldn't measure recipient's hand. Took a risk and got what I thought would work and it fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little guy, not top of the line, but keeps his hands clean and a protected from the brush and long grass
customer_reviews.author: George Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality of these.  Glad I bought these 100%
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of these. Glad I bought these 100%
customer_reviews.author: red_rider374

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: but in first crash some of the stitching came undone and created a small hole
customer_reviews.author: Dan Feske

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, bought for a toddler so they were ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, bought for a toddler so they were a tad too big! But he will grow into them! :)
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 9 year old size medium fit great
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome love them 😊😊
customer_reviews.text: Excellent description super fast shipping number one seller they are very comfortable and lol they fit like a glove☺☺☺

customer_reviews.title: I am an adult and could wear a child's medium comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: These are sized somewhat big. I am an adult and could wear a child's medium comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The advertising lead us to believe we were getting extra ...
customer_reviews.text: The advertising lead us to believe we were getting extra small children's gloves as we were ordering for a 4-year-old. What we got were obviously for an extra small adult hand. Misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great! Loved them so much when it came time for 2nd pair we ordered same ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Gowens

customer_reviews.title: Very good!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this motorcycle glove for my son to use on his bicycle pulled him blisters on his hands. The glove is beautiful and thought this used but looks brand new, your friends will envy!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit, comfy Glove
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and the directions for measuring worked well. Have no complaints yet. We'll see how they hold up in the long term
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose. Looks great. Fits great. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves.....
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool gloves. They are true to size. I bought my son a large and he's 10 but he has big hands. The large is a little big but he will grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: Fawna Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work really good if you are buying them to keep your hands clean. If you getting them to protect your hands, not soo good.
customer_reviews.author: itlldo

customer_reviews.title: IMPORTANT.
customer_reviews.text: They fit great! Read the info part and do measure your hand a couple times. They look just like the photo! Pretty awesome looking gloves
customer_reviews.author: Bchaudoin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are small for sizing and are the quality the price indicates.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The great pair of gloves the large fit Great. I'm a bagger at a grocery store, and I don't know where people's bags have been. I know they are motorcycle gloves but I will recommend them. Not to mention the look hella awesome. I get compliments about how cool they are at work.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bleyhl

customer_reviews.title: He loved the color too
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 8-year-old's hands perfectly. He loved the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Celeste Parker

customer_reviews.title: Gloves don’t fit the correct sizes
customer_reviews.text: Horrible sizing on these gloves. Bought them to fit a child, and they fit my hands. Very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Wear them all the time when I ride dirt bikes. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Meaga

customer_reviews.title: also there great quality I had some before I bought these and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my little brother and they were able to ship them early and fast, also there great quality I had some before I bought these and loved them and I'm ruff on gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Jarom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did the job just didn't last much after a couple months of use had hole under fingers
customer_reviews.author: Francheska

customer_reviews.title: Really snug and cool looking. Good for paintball and rather sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really snug and cool looking. Good for paintball and rather sturdy. Don't be too afraid about larger sizes. I order XXl and was surprised at how well they fit. Good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Glives
customer_reviews.text: I love the gloves. They have great padding and feel great. The shipping was really fast too.
customer_reviews.author: James Crull

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes I liked the gloves they are worth it because you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Thease are definitely worth the price. I ended up ordering the xxl because they were the only ones left but was pleasantly surprised they fit perfect. So point is go a size bigger than you think.
customer_reviews.author: mka

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have previously reviewed and have had a change of heart, the company that sold the gloves contacted me and I was impressed, They did say the gloves should be both gender? I still do not see how an XL for a woman can fit and XL for a man. But they offered to refund my money, so there you have it a great way to keep me as a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Cordaro

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Look great. Definitely for light riding at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I picked the perfect size and they are actually comfortable they are soft on the grip and has good protection on the other side. AWESOME
customer_reviews.author: Caden

customer_reviews.title: great gloves
customer_reviews.text: 5 starrs. Great fit, comfortable, and just the right thickness. Glad i chose these. Good deal for the price! Thanks

customer_reviews.title: motocross gloves
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my nephew because i thought they looked like something he would like and he was not disappointed!! Great item and a great price!! thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Bought these for my son for Christmas. Fit him perfectly. Color matched the rest of his gear. No complaints here :)

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable, but they could be more solid, for better protection in the palm of the hand, I think

customer_reviews.title: mean green gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great! i just recieved these gloves, and they fit great, the size is perfect, quality seems good, cant wait to go riding!

customer_reviews.title: Awsome deal
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are comfy and fit great. Will buy more in other colors in near future. Great buy for anyone.

customer_reviews.title: nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: Rated at 4 stars because when shipped visor was broke which was a time delay, however was able to get a new one shipped in time for Christmas. Find the visor does not fit on helmet quite straight but is okay. The helmet itself is very nice - nice colors, looks sharp! My 9 yr old loves it. The gloves to match fit nice and look cool. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: faith schriver

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves but unfortunately run too big
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves but unfortunately run too big. I will have to return them and get an extra small for my 9 year old.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for warm weather
customer_reviews.text: Runs smaller than Mechanix wear. But barely. Good enough for warm weather. Not very protective.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves that will work great for riding our ATV's. The quality is surprisingly good and you won't find another pair for the price! Fast shipping too!

customer_reviews.title: Good riding gloves for him
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 11 year old son well. Good riding gloves for him.
